channel.title: A little help from a decent coder please?

item.title: A little help from a decent coder please?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

wed330:

ughhh none of it’s working…this is an epic fail…=[

Hmmm… let me look through code again… FOUND PROBLEM!

[code]
case 7332:
if ((gotStarter == 0) || (playerRights >= 1)){
sendMessage(“You obtain a set of Dharok’s armour!”);
addItem(4716, 1);
addItem(4718, 1);
addItem(4720, 1);
addItem(4722, 1);
gotStarter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
}
// ((( (I forgot the } here))))
else if ((gotstarter == 1) && (playerRights < 1)) {
sendMessage("Sorry " + playerName + ", but… “);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " tried getting more than one Dharok’s set! What a nub!”);

        }
    }  ((((EXTRA BRACKET))))           
        break;[/code]

Final case:

[code]
case 7332:
if ((gotStarter == 0) || (playerRights >= 1)) {
sendMessage(“You obtain a set of Dharok’s armour!”);
addItem(4716, 1);
addItem(4718, 1);
addItem(4720, 1);
addItem(4722, 1);
gotStarter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
}
else if ((gotstarter == 1) && (playerRights < 1)) {
sendMessage("Sorry " + playerName + ", but… “);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " tried getting more than one Dharok’s set! What a nub!”);
}

        break;[/code]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“davidi2, post:17, topic:280527”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=370529.msg2800551#msg2800551 date=1243362698]
What the hell? ‘case 7332 = 1;’?

[code=java] case 7332:
if(variable == 0) {
sendMessage(“You obtain a set of Dharok’s armour!”);
addItem(4716, 1);
addItem(4718, 1);
addItem(4720, 1);
addItem(4722, 1);
variable = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
else
sendMessage("Sorry " + playerName + ", but… “);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " tried getting more than one Dharok’s set! What a nub!”);

        }           
        break;[/code]

[/quote]

lol thats what i said[quote author=davidi2 link=topic=370529.msg2800549#msg2800549 date=1243362645]
if (case 7332 == 0) {

why have that? try doing this:
[/quote]

But you’d also need to add “variable” in the save and load char voids. Thats what i showed.[/quote]
I was only giving him a start. And it’s not ‘voids’; they’re called methods.

item.title: A little help from a decent coder please?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

if (case 7332 == 0) {

why have that? try doing this:

In client.java, search for characterfile.write("character-rights = ", 0, 19);
Under that, there should be a bunch of characterfile.newLine();
under one of those newLine()'s add this:

characterfile.write("gotStarter = ", 0, 13); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(gotStarter), 0, Integer.toString(gotStarter).length()); characterfile.newLine();

Ok, now for the saveChar() void:
Search for: public boolean saveChar()
Under /*CHARACTER*/ add:

characterfile.write("gotStarter = ", 0, 13); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(gotStarter), 0, Integer.toString(gotStarter).length()); characterfile.newLine();

Heres the finished case:

[code]case 7332:
if ((gotStarter == 0) || (playerRights >= 1)){
sendMessage(“You obtain a set of Dharok’s armour!”);
addItem(4716, 1);
addItem(4718, 1);
addItem(4720, 1);
addItem(4722, 1);
gotStarter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
else if ((gotstarter == 1) && (playerRights < 1)) {
sendMessage("Sorry " + playerName + ", but… “);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " tried getting more than one Dharok’s set! What a nub!”);

        }
    }             
        break;[/code]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @jarnohhh jarnohhh
item.description:
@jarnohhh wrote:

Try this one

[code] case 7332:
if (case 7332 == 0) {
sendMessage(“You obtain a set of Dharok’s armour!”);
addItem(4716, 1);
addItem(4718, 1);
addItem(4720, 1);
addItem(4722, 1);
case 7332 = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
else if (case 7332 == 1) {
sendMessage("Sorry " + playerName + ", but… “);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " tried getting more than one Dharok’s set! What a nub!”);

        }
    }             
        break;[/code]

or this one

[code] case 7332:
if (case 7332 == 0) {
sendMessage(“You obtain a set of Dharok’s armour!”);
addItem(4716, 1);
addItem(4718, 1);
addItem(4720, 1);
addItem(4722, 1);
case 7332 = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (case 7332 == 1) {
sendMessage("Sorry " + playerName + ", but… “);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " tried getting more than one Dharok’s set! What a nub!”);

        }
        
        break;[/code]

@johno2 wrote:

wed330:

No im making it a case on the ques interface, the case is the first line on the quest section. But im not sure whats wrong=[

But why do you want it as a quest interface? Why not just a simple command. Also, if you wanted to use a quest interface, try searching the case from one of the quests, and replacing it with your script?

item.title: A little help from a decent coder please?
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Dude, why is it a case? Can’t you jsut do this

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(4716, 1);
addItem(4718, 1);
addItem(4720, 1);
addItem(4722, 1);
sendMessage(“Dharock starter kit”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Sorry.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " Is a noob and is trying to get a extra starter!! :p");

        }
    }

Read full topic
item.source: A little help from a decent coder please?

item.title: A little help from a decent coder please?
item.dc:creator: @wed330 wed330
item.description:
@wed330 wrote:

Hey i’ve been working on a command to give you dharok’s armour, but as with ::starter only once, please don’t laugh, im REALLY new to coding, but could you tell me what’s wrong please?:

        case 7332:
            if (case 7332 == 0) {
                sendMessage("You obtain a set of Dharok's armour!");
                addItem(4716, 1);
                addItem(4718, 1);
                addItem(4720, 1);
                addItem(4722, 1); 
                case 7332 = 1;  
                savemoreinfo();
                savechar(); 
            } else if (case 7332 == 1) {
                sendMessage("Sorry " + playerName + ", but... ");
                PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
                        + " tried getting more than one Dharok's set! What a nub!");

            }
        }             
            break;

Read full topic
